options.content:
## About the Bloom Compactor
The compactor iterates through chunks and creates blooms out of them.
The size of the resulting blooms depends on the bloom filter settings, the tokenizer settings, the number of ring tokens per compactor and the total number opf compactors.

Compactors are horizontally scalable and uses a ring to:
- Shard tenants
- Shard series fingerprints within a tenant subring.

The blooms for the series are grouped together in blocks which are flushed to object store.

panels.description: Cell-wide compaction progress. Should increase till completion throughout each compaction period.
panels.title: Progress

panels.description: Uncompressed size of chunks in a series VS the size of the blooms built.
panels.title: Chunks and Bloom size

panels.description: Blooms size vs uncompressed chunk size.
panels.title: Errors
We use tenant sharding so each compactor will process a subset of the tenants.

panels.description:
Shows the expected number of cpu cores we need to provision to build blooms as fast as we ingest data so a compaction iteration doesn't take longer than the compaction interval.

We may decide to have more to speed up compaction.

targets.expr:
# This query shows the expected number of cpu cores we need to not fall behind
# building blooms for data we're ingesting.
# conceptually, the formula is:
# (cell_bytes * space_amplification / bloom_bytes_processed_per_core)

# number of replicas needed
sum(avg_over_time(loki_cell:bytes:rate1m{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
*
## Space amplification (how much data do we write compared to what we ingest?)
(
  # rep factor
  3 *
  sum(
    # 1 - dedupe_ratio
    1 - 
    sum(rate(loki_chunk_store_deduped_chunks_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])) by (cluster, namespace)
    /
    sum(rate(loki_ingester_chunks_flushed_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}[$__rate_interval])) by (cluster, namespace)
  )
)
/
(
sum(rate(loki_bloomcompactor_chunk_series_size_sum{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container="bloom-compactor"}[$__rate_interval]))
/
sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container="bloom-compactor"}[$__rate_interval]))
)

panels.title: Required CPUs to not lag behind

targets.expr:
# MB/s/core chunk data processed
sum(rate(loki_bloomcompactor_chunk_series_size_sum{cluster=~"$cluster", job=~"$namespace/bloom-compactor"}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod)
/
sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", container="bloom-compactor"}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod)

panels.description: How many tokens each compactor is appending to blooms. Accounts for tokens that are not actually added to the blooms since they are already there. See the panel on the right for a drill down on the collision.

targets.expr:
# tokens checked per pod, millions/s
sum(rate(loki_bloom_tokens_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container="bloom-compactor"}[$__rate_interval]))
/
sum(count(loki_bloom_tokens_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container="bloom-compactor"}))
/ 1e6

panels.title: Tokens rate (millions)

panels.description:
Collision type may be `false` (no collision), `cache` (found in token cache) or true (found in bloom filter).

Type may be either `raw` (the original ngram) or `chunk_prefixed` (the ngram with the chunk prefix)

targets.expr:
# tokens/s by type+collision
sum by (collision) (
    rate(loki_bloom_inserts_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container="bloom-compactor"}[$__rate_interval])
) 
/ on () group_left
sum (
    rate(loki_bloom_inserts_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container="bloom-compactor"}[$__rate_interval])
)

panels.title: tokens/s by collision type

panels.description: The sizes of the blooms created by the compactor. We build one bloom per series. The more unique ngrams and chunks the series has, the bigger their blooms will be.
panels.title: Bloom size

panels.description:
How many chunks are we indexing in the blooms. Either:
- `copied` from a pre-existing bloom block, or 
- `iterated` through all its entries if processed for the first time.

targets.expr:
# chunks indexed, by iteration or copied from a pre-existing bloom
sum(rate(loki_bloom_chunks_indexed_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container="bloom-compactor"}[$__rate_interval])) by (type)

panels.title: Chunks indexed

panels.description: Compactors delete metas and blocks marked for deletion in the metas tombstones.
panels.title: Deleted Blocks

panels.description: Number of overlapping bloom blocks reused when creating new blocks
panels.title: Blocks reused

panels.description: Compactors delete metas and blocks marked for deletion in the metas tombstones.
panels.title: Deleted Metas
We use tenant sharding so each compactor will process a subset of the tenants.
Series per compaction (includes series copied from other blocks)

targets.expr:
# series checked per compaction
histogram_quantile(
    0.99, 
    sum by (le) (
        rate(loki_bloomcompactor_series_per_compaction_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container="bloom-compactor"}[$__rate_interval])
    )
)

# series checked per compaction
histogram_quantile(
    0.9, 
    sum by (le) (
        rate(loki_bloomcompactor_series_per_compaction_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container="bloom-compactor"}[$__rate_interval])
    )
)

# series checked per compaction
histogram_quantile(
    0.5, 
    sum by (le) (
        rate(loki_bloomcompactor_series_per_compaction_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container="bloom-compactor"}[$__rate_interval])
    )
)

panels.title: avg series per compaction by pod
Number of bytes from chunks added to blocks during each compaction.

targets.expr:
# series checked per compaction
histogram_quantile(
    0.99, 
    sum by (le) (
        rate(loki_bloomcompactor_bytes_per_compaction_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container="bloom-compactor"}[$__rate_interval])
    )
)

# series checked per compaction
histogram_quantile(
    0.9, 
    sum by (le) (
        rate(loki_bloomcompactor_bytes_per_compaction_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container="bloom-compactor"}[$__rate_interval])
    )
)

# series checked per compaction
histogram_quantile(
    0.5, 
    sum by (le) (
        rate(loki_bloomcompactor_bytes_per_compaction_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container="bloom-compactor"}[$__rate_interval])
    )
)

panels.title: avg bytes per compaction by pod

options.content:
Compactors write blocks to the attached PVs before flushing them into the object store.
It also download chunks and index files.

After compacting a given tenant, all the downloaded index files and chunks, as well as the already flushed blocks are deleted.

targets.expr: max by(persistentvolumeclaim) (kubelet_volume_stats_used_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"} / kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}) and count by(persistentvolumeclaim) (kube_persistentvolumeclaim_labels{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace",label_name=~"bloom-compactor"})

sum by(instance, pod, device) (rate(node_disk_written_bytes_total[$__rate_interval])) + ignoring(pod) group_right() (label_replace(count by(instance, pod, device) (container_fs_writes_bytes_total{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", container="bloom-compactor", device!~".*sda.*"}), "device", "$1", "device", "/dev/(.*)") * 0)

sum by(instance, pod, device) (rate(node_disk_read_bytes_total[$__rate_interval])) + ignoring(pod) group_right() (label_replace(count by(instance, pod, device) (container_fs_writes_bytes_total{cluster=~"$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", container="bloom-compactor", device!~".*sda.*"}), "device", "$1", "device", "/dev/(.*)") * 0)

options.content:
Once all blocks and metas are built locally, the compactor flushes them to the object store.

After each iteration, the compactor deletes the metas and blocks marked for deletion in the tombstones.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (operation, le) (rate(loki_gcs_request_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container="bloom-compactor"} [$__rate_interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (operation, le) (rate(loki_gcs_request_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container="bloom-compactor"} [$__rate_interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (operation, le) (rate(loki_gcs_request_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container="bloom-compactor"} [$__rate_interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (operation, le) (rate(loki_s3_request_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container="bloom-compactor"} [$__rate_interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (operation, le) (rate(loki_s3_request_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container="bloom-compactor"} [$__rate_interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (operation, le) (rate(loki_s3_request_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container="bloom-compactor"} [$__rate_interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (operation, le) (rate(loki_azure_blob_request_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container="bloom-compactor"} [$__rate_interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (operation, le) (rate(loki_azure_blob_request_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container="bloom-compactor"} [$__rate_interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (operation, le) (rate(loki_azure_blob_request_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace", container="bloom-compactor"} [$__rate_interval])))
